      • loadUserByUsername

        public org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails loadUserByUsername(String pUsername)
                                                                             throws org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
        Méthode à recharger quand on veut récupérer le user à partir du username pour spring security
        Returns a populated UserDetails object. The username is first retrieved from the database and then mapped to a UserDetails object.
        Parameters:
        pUsername - The username
        Returns:
        populated UserDetails object

        org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException
